Bug fix serial command readBy using Console.readString, the mower can get stuck and act like a zombie. The reason is, readSerial is a blocking function with a default timeout of 1000ms. If new data arrive faster, it will never return. Also if setting timeout lower by using setTimeout function, it will fail if many messages arrive.Therefore I changed back to waitStringConsole as it takes many messages per second without any trouble.Other changes: optional CONSOLE_BAUDRATE when using CC and DUE (must be uncommented to use)Small bugfix with event configuration of RMCS messages/events
Try reset I2C /w IMU in case of read error
